unbrickMode.title: Drone Unbrick Mode (TFTP + TTL)
unbrickMode.Steps:
Steps:
1. Download the complete bin firmware from the official website and upload it to GS.
2. Connect the camera serial port to the serial port UART3 of radxa zero3 (PIN3->RX, PIN5->TX, PIN9->GND)
3. Connect the camera network cable to the network card or USB network card network port of radxa zero3
4. Start the brick recovery service, and the TFTP server and serial web console will be opened
5. Press Enter in the serial console, power on the camera, and enter the uboot console
6. Execute the following commands line by line
   ## Enter commands line by line! Do not copy and paste multiple lines at once!
    * setenv ipaddr 192.168.1.10; setenv serverip 192.168.1.20
    * mw.b 0x21000000 0xff 0x800000
    * tftpboot 0x21000000 firmware.bin
    * sf probe 0; sf lock 0;
    * sf erase 0x0 0x800000; sf write 0x21000000 0x0 0x800000
    * reset
